Title.evidence: Title: Randomised Controlled Trial of a Nomogram for Predicting Spread Through Air Spaces in Stage IA Lung Adenocarcinoma

Participants.evidence: A retrospective analysis was conducted on 1,375 patients with stage IA LUAD at Sun Yat-sen University Cancer Center.

Objective.evidence: This study aimed to develop a preoperative prediction model for Spread Through Air Spaces (STAS) in stage IA lung adenocarcinoma (LUAD) to guide surgical decision-making.

Result_Outcome.evidence: The nomogram demonstrated good predictive accuracy (AUC = 0.812, 95% CI: 0.761–0.863) with a sensitivity of 69.5% and specificity of 80.2%.
